Util

Class Uleb128

  • java.lang.Object
    • Util.Uleb128

  • public final class Uleb128
extends java.lang.Object
    See wiki for details on encoding.

    Adopted from LLVM source. This class assumes the maximum input value fits into a Java long type.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • fromByteStream

        public static Uleb128 fromByteStream(java.io.InputStream bytes)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a ULEB128 value from the input bytestream. This method does not close the stream when finished.
        Parameters:
        bytes - ULEB128-encoded long bytes.
        Returns:
        a Uleb128 instance representing the byte sequence.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on any read error.
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if the encoding indicates that the input value is too large to fit into a Java long. This method will consume the input up to the maximum allowed ULEB128 encoding which fits into a long, even on error.

      • fromLong

        public static Uleb128 fromLong(long value)

        public long asLong()

      • asBytes

        public byte[] asBytes()
